Your MusicSpotify for ArtistsPromotionPlaylistsUpload beta

Your Music

LayoutNode.Content: Welcome to Spotify for Artists! We’ve created this guide to walk you through setting up your artist profile, customizing your presence, and growing your fanbase on Spotify.
LayoutNode.SRC: Welcome to Spotify for Artists! We’ve created this guide to walk you through setting up your artist profile, customizing your presence, and growing your fanbase on Spotify.

LayoutNode.Content: DELIVERY
LayoutNode.SRC: Delivery

LayoutNode.Content: Getting your music on Spotify.
LayoutNode.SRC: Getting your music on Spotify.

LayoutNode.Content: First things first: Getting your music on Spotify is easy. If you have a label or aggregator, they’ll get your music on Spotify for you. If you don't, we have deals in place with a number of companieswho can deliver your music to us and collect royalties for you.
LayoutNode.SRC: First things first: Getting your music on Spotify is easy. If you have a label or aggregator, they’ll get your music on Spotify for you. If you don't, we have deals in place with a number of companies who can deliver your music to us and collect royalties for you.

LayoutNode.Content: These services handle the licensing and distribution of your music and also pay you royalties when your fans stream your music on Spotify. There’s usually a small fee or percentage cut involved.Each service is unique, so be sure to do a little homework before picking one.
LayoutNode.SRC: These services handle the licensing and distribution of your music and also pay you royalties when your fans stream your music on Spotify. There’s usually a small fee or percentage cut involved. Each service is unique, so be sure to do a little homework before picking one.

LayoutNode.Content: SPOTIFY PREFERRED ARTIST DISTRIBUTORS
LayoutNode.SRC: SPOTIFY PREFERRED ARTIST DISTRIBUTORS

LayoutNode.Content: OTHER PREFERRED ARTIST DISTRIBUTORS
LayoutNode.SRC: OTHER PREFERRED ARTIST DISTRIBUTORS

LayoutNode.Content: EmuBands , CD Baby
LayoutNode.SRC: EmuBands, CD Baby

LayoutNode.Content: If you're using DistroKid or CD Baby as your distributor, you get instant access to Spotify for Artists. Just log into your account on their site and follow the steps!
LayoutNode.SRC: If you're using DistroKid or CD Baby as your distributor, you get instant access to Spotify for Artists. Just log into your account on their site and follow the steps!

LayoutNode.Content: DELIVERY PLATFORMS
LayoutNode.SRC: DELIVERY PLATFORMS

LayoutNode.Content: FUGA
LayoutNode.SRC: FUGA

LayoutNode.Content: Our preferred providers are ones who meet our standards for providing the highest quality metadata, protecting against infringement, and giving their users easy access to Spotify for Artists. Our investment in any provider does not affect who is featured on this page, nor does it affect any decisions about how content is treated on Spotify's service.
LayoutNode.SRC: Our preferred providers are ones who meet our standards for providing the highest quality metadata, protecting against infringement, and giving their users easy access to Spotify for Artists. Our investment in any provider does not affect who is featured on this page, nor does it affect any decisions about how content is treated on Spotify's service.Our preferred providers are ones who meet our standards for providing the highest quality metadata, protecting against infringement, and giving their users easy access to Spotify for Artists. Our investment in any provider does not affect who is featured on this page, nor does it affect any decisions about how content is treated on Spotify's service.

LayoutNode.Content: We've also developed an upload tool within Spotify for Artists, now available in limited beta to US based independent artists. Read more on our blog !
LayoutNode.SRC: We've also developed an upload tool within Spotify for Artists, now available in limited beta to US based independent artists. Read more on our blog!

LayoutNode.Content: PROHIBITED CONTENT
LayoutNode.SRC: Prohibited Content

LayoutNode.Content: Guidelines for music on Spotify.
LayoutNode.SRC: Guidelines for music on Spotify.

LayoutNode.Content: Spotify is an open platform for artistic expression. We believe in everyone’s right to share their voice. So generally, all creators and content are welcome on Spotify. However, in some scenarios where content is infringing, illegal, explicit, or hateful, it may be removed or filtered from Spotify. There’s more about what content is prohibited here .
LayoutNode.SRC: Spotify is an open platform for artistic expression. We believe in everyone’s right to share their voice. So generally, all creators and content are welcome on Spotify. However, in some scenarioswhere content is infringing, illegal, explicit, or hateful, it may be removed or filtered from Spotify. There’s more about what content is prohibited here.
